name: BeyondtheOMwithYogiLou
0:
”Alexa, open yogi lou”
”Alexa, ask yogi lou for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start yogi lou”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: yogi lou
des: Listen to the latest talks from Beyond the OM with Yogi Lou. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
